definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: This is basically a one-step operation.
sentences.chinese: 這基本上是一個單步操作。

sentences.english: The effect is basically the same as the home air purifier.
sentences.chinese: 其作用原理與家用的空氣淨化器基本上是相同的。

sentences.english: His policy of overseas contacts was generally followed by his successors in Ming Dyn …
sentences.chinese: 明朝後代基本上沿用了太祖的海外交往政策。

sentences.english: In the knowledge that learned during school can say basically otiose .
sentences.chinese: 在校期間學了的知識，可以說基本上沒有用的。

sentences.english: Zhou Lan did well and made no serious mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 周蘭做得很好，基本上沒什麼差錯。

sentences.english: This product sells well, there are no goods remaining every month.
sentences.chinese: 這種產品銷路順暢，基本上每月都是滿產滿銷。

sentences.english: There are basically two classes of testing.
sentences.chinese: 基本上來說測試分爲兩種。

sentences.english: I stayed with OSV as long as I was painting trains basically.
sentences.chinese: 我住的OSV只要我基本上是繪畫列車。

sentences.english: So,basically, what is the problem of life according to this author?
sentences.chinese: 所以，基本上，這位作者認爲生命的問題是什麼？

sentences.english: Well, having babies and marrying are not, necessarily, the same thing.
sentences.chinese: 生孩子跟結婚基本上是兩碼子事。

sentences.english: During the period of Principate, the Roman army underwent two important changes.
sentences.chinese: 進入帝國時期以後，羅馬的擴張活動基本上偃旗息鼓。

sentences.english: Well yes, in some ways, but it is basically the same process.
sentences.chinese: 恩，在某些方面只這樣的，但基本上過程是相同的。

sentences.english: Sino-Japanese War period, the County is the coexistence of two regimes.
sentences.chinese: 抗日戰爭時期，縣境基本上是兩種政權並存。

sentences.english: Oh, overcome that? Basically just... I worked, you know,
sentences.chinese: 哦，戰勝困難？基本上，我就是工作。

sentences.english: It is cheap, abundant and often local.
sentences.chinese: 它價格低廉，貯量豐富，而且基本上就在當地。

sentences.english: Programming has been essentially a solitary profession for the last five decades.
sentences.chinese: 在過去五十年裏，編程基本上是一種單幹的職業。

definition: in large part/the greater part/the majority
for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
almost/nearly/more or less/about the same/good enough/not bad
Dadu, capital of China during the Yuan Dynasty (1280-1368), modern day Beijing
for the most part/on the whole/also pr. [da4 du1]
for the most part/on the whole/metropolitan
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
